definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Other violence occurred at Friendship Road and at Liberation Road, they said.
sentences.chinese: 他们说还有其它的暴力事件发生在友谊路和解放大道。

sentences.english: There is also a Children's Corner in our zoo.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里还有个儿童乐园。

sentences.english: And those grownup who lose to a kid have the audacity to complaint?
sentences.chinese: 这些输了的成年人还有脸抱怨？

sentences.english: Anna Hu joined in as Group Business Director and other hires.
sentences.chinese: 胡晓云加入担任业务群总监，还有一些新成员加盟。

sentences.english: As the Speaker said, we've got more to do.
sentences.chinese: 正如佩洛西所说的，我们还有许多事情要做。

sentences.english: Have you got some unfinished business?
The maggots also provide a cool, pre-industrial expiration date.
sentences.chinese: 而这蛆还有一个很酷的，工业化以前的终止日期。

sentences.english: There are shelled the Preah Vihear Temple in the military demands of the masses.
sentences.chinese: 还有群众要求军方炮轰柏威夏寺。

sentences.english: We also have carbon s p 2 hydrogen 1 s bonds.
Urn on the outside, as well as a city, called East Rochester.
sentences.chinese: 瓮城的外面，还有一座城，叫做东罗城。

sentences.english: And always grouper and snapper," he added.
sentences.chinese: 另外还有始终供应的石斑鱼与红鳍笛鲷鱼。

sentences.english: Golden, with a very fine cordon of bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 金黄色的酒液，还有精致的小气泡。

sentences.english: And where do I find shoelaces?
sentences.chinese: 还有我去哪儿可以找到鞋带。

sentences.english: And the children of Amram； Aaron， and Moses， and Miriam.
sentences.chinese: 暗兰的儿子是亚伦，摩西，还有女儿米利暗。

sentences.english: Why would anyone care about them outside of this domain?
sentences.chinese: 在这个领域之外还有什么人会在乎它呢？

sentences.english: The original resteruant has been changed to a tea house now.
sentences.chinese: 还有，原来吃包子的地方现在改成茶室了。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
apart from this/in addition to this
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
et cetera/and so on .../wait a minute!/hold on!
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
